page.title: 02THE NEWTON PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: The Newton is situated on Sprotbrough Road.It was built in 1938. There have been three previous landlords and the present landlord is called Wilfred Rogers. He has lived there for seven years.He was born on the 20.6.1938. Wilfred is the manager and employs a staff of seventeen people not including his relief staff.His public house also serves meals. On average 7,000 pints of beer are sold a week most of which is Whitbread Trophy Bitter but Lager is slowly increasing in popularity. The most popular short drink is Fruit Juice.New beer is delivered every week. An Inspector from the Whitbread Brewery visits the Newton once a month. There are two darts teams and one for dominoes. Although the Newton is old it has only had one alteration.
